pages.title: Certus Quartz Ore
pages.text: A commonly found ore which, when mined, drops $(l:ae2:world_gen/certus_quartz_crystals#crystal)Certus Quartz Crystal$(/l). Another varient, $(l:ae2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore#charged_ore)Charged Certus Quartz Ore$(/l), also spawns in the Overworld more rarely.

pages.title: Charged C. Q. Ore
pages.text: Spawns semi commonly in the overworld, but unlike $(l:ae2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore)Certus Quartz Ore$(/l) it drops $(l:ae2:world_gen/certus_quartz_ore#charged_crystal)Charged Certus Quartz Crystal.$(/l)
